name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_event
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.event for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.event from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented. In some cases, the event is inherent in the type Code, such as a "History and Physical Report" in which the procedure being documented is necessarily a "History and Physical" act.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.event` has no related element in R4B:DocumentReference `DocumentReference.event` has no related element in R4B:Media

element.definition: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented. binding.description: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts being documented.
